nodes.text: The Fardi clan was a powerful and wealthy smuggling family that operated on the Outer Rim world Thabeska one year after the Galactic Empire had been established. The clan managed to avoid the scrutiny of the Empire by having several legal businesses that served as a cover for their smuggling operations. While on the run from the Empire, former-Jedi Ahsoka Tano worked for the Fardi clan as a courier.
